metadata.Name: Shamela
metadata.Description: A large-scale historical Arabic corpus containing over 6,000 texts and 1 billion words, covering a period of 14 centuries.
metadata.Paper Title: Shamela: A Large-Scale Historical Arabic Corpus

metadata.Abstract: This paper presents the development of a large-scale historical Arabic corpus, comprising 1 billion words from a 14-century time span. The corpus is drawn from the Al-Maktaba Al-Shamela website and has been cleaned, processed with a morphological analyzer, and enhanced by detecting parallel passages and automatically dating undated texts. The corpus is made available to the research community and demonstrated to be useful for digital humanities research and NLP applications.
